content:
/>
X.iv.1.B.5.c
.
Favorable DRB Determinations
If the outcome of a second review of a DRB determination is
favorable
, carefully review the full service records and determine if the former service member was discharged or released under one of the conditions listed in
38 CFR 3.12(c)
.
If so, follow the instructions in
M21-1, Part X, Subpart iv, 1.B.5.d
If not, use the favorable DRB determination as the basis for a finding that a claimant is eligible for VA benefits.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart iv, Chapter 1, Section B  - Special Topics Involving Character of Discharge
citation: Part X, Subpart iv, Chapter 1, Section B
